name: QA engineer (web)
description:
Impress is a European direct-to-consumer teeth-aligner and oral care startup. We provide an affordable and convenient way to straighten teeth with aligners treatment. Our long-term vision is to disrupt European conventional dentistry and orthodontia.

We are searching for a Quality Assurance Engineer who want to works with very fast growing start-up and can be flexible with it.

Why we’re cool:

  • Remote work or relocation in sunny Barcelona. Some of us prefer to work together in our Barcelona office and others prefer remote. For us, there’s no difference as long as you have an excellent internet connection;

  • Highly skilled development team who stand for quality code. After having built many products in the past, we started Impress using serverless and a scalable infrastructure from day 1 to allow for faster development; We like functional and reactive functional programming paradigms.

  • Highly experienced business and marketing team (Airbnb, Uber);

  • A new project, no legacy;

  • No time tracking. Flexible schedule, the main thing is the result;

  • We are ready to meet you and discuss your money expectations =)

Our current technology stack is Node.js on the back-end and React on the front-end, DynamoDB and, PostgreSQL for storing data and Amazon SQS as a message queue. Also, we are using Git and Jira.

Necessary skills:

  • 2+ years commercial experience in manual testing;

  • Web application testing experience (APIs and Frontend UIs);

  • Practical experience with cross-browser/mobile testing using relevant tools;

  • Thorough understanding of web technologies & protocols and the principals of Web APIs (e.g. REST, Web Sockets);

  • Experience using black/gray/white box techniques to ensure expected behavior;

  • Ability to write detailed technical documentation;

  • Good knowledge of current development technology trends.

Amazing if:

  • Mobile testing experience (Android, and iPhone/iPad);

  • English verbal and written communication skills.

  • Experience with JavaScript / TypeScript;

  • In-depth knowledge of Automation Testing (Selenium WebDriver, Cypress or other test runners);

  • Good understanding of the principles of Agile working patterns and frameworks (e.g. Scrum/Kanban);

What you will do:

  • Design, development and deployment of the Quality Assurance process;

  • Ensure that all feature deliverables meet quality objectives;

  • Build effective test cases for manual testing;

  • Work together with Impress engineers to identify risks, understand how new features should be tested, and then engage them in contributing automated and manual tests;

Join our talent international team and let's Impress everyone)
